original_text:
Nefertiti’s Riches
Il fascino dell’Egitto è in grado di rapire. Statue, piramidi, reperti misteriosi, e una storia in parte ancora avvolta nell’oscurità lo rendono da sempre la location perfetta per film, libri e videogiochi.
Come se non bastasse, impariamo a conoscerlo sin da bambini, studiandolo già alle elementari. Ci si innamora molto presto quindi della sua storia, del suo pantheon e dei personaggi che lo hanno caratterizzato, come la bellissima Cleopatra.
La nuova slot della RedRake Gaming mantiene gli standard ai quali le loro slot ci hanno abituati, ma prendono come tema proprio l’antico Egitto. Saranno riusciti a creare un buon prodotto? Andiamo a scoprirlo analizzando prima il comparto artistico, e poi il gameplay.
Le Notti Di Nefertiti’s Riches
Nonostante le griglie della RedRake siano solitamente enormi, finendo per coprire la maggior parte dello sfondo, l’azienda riesce a creare sempre un ottimo comparto grafico, utilizzando sapientemente il comparto sonoro e quel poco sfondo che si riesce ad intravedere.
Tutto ciò è valido anche nel contesto di Nefertiti’s Riches. L’immensa griglia da 6 rulli da 10 righe ciascuno è posta, assieme agli innumerevoli indicatori e pulsanti (tutti decorati rispettando il tema) su un bellissimo sfondo che riesce a brillare pur essendo coperto.
La magia della notte in un deserto, sotto immense statue e ancor più mastodontiche piramidi è amplificata da una musica perfetta per l’atmosfera e da effetti sonori molto soddisfacenti.
I simboli rispecchiano perfettamente il tema. Ciò vale sia per quelli speciali, tra cui troviamo Cleopatra (che occupa due posizioni), vasi, troni e gioielli, sia per quelli semplici, rappresentati da lettere e numeri decorati in stile egiziano.
Il simbolo Wild raffigura invece delle piramidi alle cui spalle è presente un eclissi, ma è comunque facilmente riconoscibile dalla scritta “Wild” che lo accompagna.
Problema comune a tutte le slot machine RedRake di questo tipo sono le dimensioni delle posizioni presenti sulla griglia. Per dar spazio a rulli da 10 righe, lo spazio dedicato ad ogni posizione è minimo. Se siete amanti delle slot machine che offrono disegni affascinanti e accattivanti, allora questo potrebbe essere un grande problema.
Barre Da Riempire E Bonus Da Raggiungere Con Nefertiti’s Riches
Come tante altre slot machine prodotte dalla RedRake, anche con Nefertiti’s Riches ci sono un milione di modi per vincere.
Ma lasciando da parte questa caratteristica valida per tutte le altre slot, vediamo quali sono le particolarità specifiche di Nefertiti’s Riches.
Possiamo dire che in qualche modo la slot si basa principalmente sulle vittorie effettuate in sequenza. Questo perché non tutte le innumerevoli posizioni presenti sui rulli non sono valide per la giocata. Alcune saranno bloccate, ma ogni vittoria distruggerà le posizioni vincenti, lasciando cadere dall’alto nuove posizioni.
Questo ha ripercussioni su due elementi della slot machine: la barra di Nefertiti e la barra bonus.
La barra di Nefertiti si riempirà man mano con ogni giocata, e una volta riempita darà inizio ad un minigioco con una griglia di gioco più piccola e con simboli diversi.
La barra bonus si riempirà solo con le vittorie consecutive, e ad ogni interruzione si svuoterà. Una volta completata però il giocatore avrà diritto a 8 giocate gratuite (inizialmente, dato che potranno aumentare) e a vari moltiplicatori.
La slot ha un RTP del 95.3%, leggermente sotto la media ma comunque valido.
Slot Machine Simili A Nefertiti’s Riches
Se cercate altre slot machine con un tema simile, allora Cleopatra Gold ed Egyptian Experience faranno sicuramente al caso vostro.

Nefertiti's Riches
The allure of Egypt is captivating. Statues, pyramids, mysterious artifacts, and a history shrouded in darkness make for the perfect setting for movies, books, and video games. We become familiar with it from childhood, studying it in elementary school. We fall in love early on with its history, pantheon, and characters, such as the beautiful Cleopatra.

The new slot machine from RedRake Gaming maintains the high standards set by their slots, with ancient Egypt as the theme. Have they created a good product? Let's find out by analyzing the artistic elements and gameplay.

The Nights of Nefertiti's Riches
Despite RedRake's typically massive grids, which often cover most of the background, the company always manages to create an excellent graphic design by skillfully using the sound effects and the little background visible. This is also true for Nefertiti's Riches. The immense 6-reel, 10-row grid is placed, along with countless indicators and buttons (all decorated in keeping with the theme) on a beautiful background that manages to shine even when covered.

The magic of the night, in a desert, under immense statues and even more gargantuan pyramids, is amplified by music perfectly suited for the atmosphere and very satisfying sound effects. The symbols perfectly reflect the theme, whether the special ones, including Cleopatra (who occupies two positions), vases, thrones, and jewels, or the simple ones, represented by letters and numbers decorated in Egypt's style.

The Wild symbol depicts pyramids with an eclipse in the background, but it is still easily recognizable by the "Wild" text that accompanies it. A common problem with all RedRake slot machines of this type is the size of the positions on the grid. To accommodate 10-row reels, the space dedicated to each position is minimal. If you are a fan of slot machines that offer fascinating and eye-catching designs, this could be a significant issue.

Bars to Fill and Bonuses to Reach with Nefertiti's Riches

Like many other slot machines produced by RedRake, there are a million ways to win with Nefertiti's Riches. Leaving aside this characteristic valid for all other slots, let's see what specific peculiarities Nefertiti's Riches has.

We can say that in some way, the slot machine is based mainly on consecutive wins. This is because not all of the countless positions on the reels are valid for the play. Some will be blocked, but each win will destroy the winning positions, leaving new positions to fall from above.

This has repercussions on two elements of the slot machine: Nefertiti's bar and the bonus bar. Nefertiti's bar will fill up with each play, and once filled, it will initiate a mini-game with a smaller game grid and different symbols.

The bonus bar will only fill up with consecutive wins, and every interruption will empty it. However, once completed, the player is entitled to 8 free spins (initially, as they can increase) and various multipliers. The slot has an RTP of 95.3%, slightly below average but still valid.

Similar Slot Machines to Nefertiti's Riches
If you're looking for other slot machines with a similar theme, then Cleopatra Gold and Egyptian Experience will surely be your cup of tea.

The Nights of Nefertiti's Riches
Despite RedRake's typically massive grids, which often cover most of the background, the company always manages to create an excellent graphic design by skillfully using the sound effects and the little background visible. This is also true for Nefertiti's Riches. The immense 6-reel, 10-row grid is placed, along with countless indicators and buttons (all decorated in keeping with the theme) on a beautiful background that manages to shine even when covered.

The magic of the night, in a desert, under immense statues and even more gargantuan pyramids, is amplified by music perfectly suited for the atmosphere and very satisfying sound effects. A common problem with all RedRake slot machines of this type is the size of the positions on the grid. To accommodate 10-row reels, the space dedicated to each position is minimal. If you are a fan of slot machines that offer fascinating and eye-catching designs, this could be a significant issue.

Bars to Fill and Bonuses to Reach with Nefertiti's Riches

Like many other slot machines produced by RedRake, there are a million ways to win with Nefertiti's Riches. Leaving aside this characteristic valid for all other slots, let's see what specific peculiarities Nefertiti's Riches has.

We can say that in some way, the slot machine is based mainly on consecutive wins. This is because not all of the countless positions on the reels are valid for the play. Some will be blocked, but each win will destroy the winning positions, leaving new positions to fall from above.

This has repercussions on two elements of the slot machine: Nefertiti's bar and the bonus bar. Nefertiti's bar will fill up with each play, and once filled, it will initiate a mini-game with a smaller game grid and different symbols.

The bonus bar will only fill up with consecutive wins, and every interruption will empty it. However, once completed, the player is entitled to 8 free spins (initially, as they can increase) and various multipliers. The slot has an RTP of 95.3%, slightly below average but still valid.

Review: Nefertiti's Riches
The allure of Egypt is captivating. Statues, pyramids, mysterious artifacts, and a history shrouded in darkness make for the perfect setting for movies, books, and video games. We become familiar with it from childhood, studying it in elementary school. We fall in love early on with its history, pantheon, and characters, such as the beautiful Cleopatra.

The new slot machine from RedRake Gaming maintains the high standards set by their slots, with ancient Egypt as the theme. Have they created a good product? Let's find out by analyzing the artistic elements and gameplay.

The Nights of Nefertiti's Riches
Despite RedRake's typically massive grids, which often cover most of the background, the company always manages to create an excellent graphic design by skillfully using the sound effects and the little background visible. This is also true for Nefertiti's Riches. The immense 6-reel, 10-row grid is placed, along with countless indicators and buttons (all decorated in keeping with the theme) on a beautiful background that manages to shine even when covered.

The magic of the night, in a desert, under immense statues and even more gargantuan pyramids, is amplified by music perfectly suited for the atmosphere and very satisfying sound effects. The symbols perfectly reflect the theme, whether the special ones, including Cleopatra (who occupies two positions), vases, thrones, and jewels, or the simple ones, represented by letters and numbers decorated in Egypt's style.

The Wild symbol depicts pyramids with an eclipse in the background, but it is still easily recognizable by the "Wild" text that accompanies it. A common problem with all RedRake slot machines of this type is the size of the positions on the grid. To accommodate 10-row reels, the space dedicated to each position is minimal. If you are a fan of slot machines that offer fascinating and eye-catching designs, this could be a significant issue.

Bars to Fill and Bonuses to Reach with Nefertiti's Riches

Like many other slot machines produced by RedRake, there are a million ways to win with Nefertiti's Riches. Leaving aside this characteristic valid for all other slots, let's see what specific peculiarities Nefertiti's Riches has.

We can say that in some way, the slot machine is based mainly on consecutive wins. This is because not all of the countless positions on the reels are valid for the play. Some will be blocked, but each win will destroy the winning positions, leaving new positions to fall from above.

This has repercussions on two elements of the slot machine: Nefertiti's bar and the bonus bar. Nefertiti's bar will fill up with each play, and once filled, it will initiate a mini-game with a smaller game grid and different symbols.

The bonus bar will only fill up with consecutive wins, and every interruption will empty it. However, once completed, the player is entitled to 8 free spins (initially, as they can increase) and various multipliers. The slot has an RTP of 95.3%, slightly below average but still valid.

Similar Slot Machines to Nefertiti's Riches
If you're looking for other slot machines with a similar theme, then Cleopatra Gold and Egyptian Experience will surely be your cup of tea.
